appendix.title: Inline Markup Usage Outside XLIFF
appendix.para: The XLIFF inline markup is designed to be usable as inline markup for other XML formats.
This is done through two concepts:

listitem.para: The content container -- The element in the host format that holds the inline markup. This is the equivalent of the <source> or <target> elements.

The unit -- The higher level element that hold the content container. This is the equivalent of the <unit> element. Depending on the type of usage of the XLIFF inline markup, this element may be needed or not.
